title: Cap Streamers, 1700–50
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamers of Point de Sedan in a design showing an intricate pattern of floral and foliated forms in complex garland design. Modes: réseau mouché, St. Esprit avec rangs clairs, Point Mignon, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers, 1700–50.
1700–50. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-52-a,b.
